name: Help me give my students the high quality sound they need with new headphones!
description:
My students are the most talented group I've seen! Their curiosity about the world around them is contagious. They all have this eagerness to learn regardless of language or culture. My students use specific technology and programs to further help develop their skills in phonics, vowel recognition, and reading comprehension to name a few.

My students are in need of headphones to help access their learning on Chromebooks.

The headphones can help single out specific sounds for letter recognition, provide reading assistance with guided reading, and let's them focus in on the skills they're aiming to improve in.

Sony MDR-ZX110 - headphones • BEST BUY EDUCATION $14.00	32 $448.00
Total project goal (including tax/processing/shipping) $618.48 

More info via the link above ⬆️
payDisclosure: This is strictly a donation to purchase the above equipment for a 3rd grade classroom.
